name: Practice Fusion
tag_list: free-emr, free-ehr, certified-emr, certified-ehr, emr-certification, healthcare, health-care, healthcareit, health-care-it, emr, electronic-medical-records, ehr, electronic-health-records, phr, personal-health-records, physician, physicians, physician-sol
overview:
Practice Fusion provides a free, web-based EMR system to physicians. With medical charting, scheduling, e-prescribing (eRx), lab integrations, referral letters, Meaningful Use certification, unlimited support and a Personal Health Record for patients, Practice Fusion’s EMR software addresses the complex needs of today’s healthcare providers and disrupts the health IT status quo.

Practice Fusion is the fastest growing electronic medical record community in the country with more than 150,000 users serving 50 million patients.

Practice Fusion’s mission is to empower physicians to save lives by making patient information available anytime, anywhere. The mission drives company culture and passion is the biggest requirement.

We’re Hiring http://www.practicefusion.com/careers

milestones.description: Practice Fusion Exceeds 1,300 Medical Professionals
milestones.source_text:
SAN FRANCISCO, Calif. Aug 6, 2008--Practice Fusion, the leader in free, web-based physician practice applications, announced today the addition of 1,300 medical professionals since its launch in November of 2007 and is currently serving more than a quarter million patients. Practice Fusionâ€™s continued growth within the physician practice community stems from the delivery of a free, web-based and easy-to-use electronic medical record (EMR) and practice management service with industry-leading features and functionality.

â€œPhysicians realize our value and are flocking to our service,â€ said Ryan Howard, chairman and CEO of Practice Fusion.  â€œAdoption of our model is reaching new heights - over 1,300 medical professionals throughout the U.S. realize the success that is possible through our vision of 'no cost physician practice applicationsâ€™ and we are now outpacing much larger vendors.â€

Much of Practice Fusionâ€™s continued growth within the physician practice community can be attributed to the â€˜Live in Fiveâ€™ process. Competing vendors in the market typically require practices to â€˜rip and replaceâ€™ their existing systems. On-site installation disrupts workflow in the office and reduces productivity and profitability.  Whereas, Practice Fusionâ€™s â€˜Live in Fiveâ€™ process allows users to activate and start using the product within five minutes of signing up.  This unique process pushes Practice Fusion to the evolutionary forefront of the medical professional community.

â€œIn spite of the fact that I had never used an EMR in my 38 years of practice, Practice Fusion is very easy to learn,â€ said Dr. Don Cauthen of Today Clinic in Oklahoma City. â€œI really don't understand why every physician does not take advantage of Practice Fusionâ€™s product and support.â€

Dr. James Miller of Child, Adolescent and Adult Psychiatry in Salt Lake City said, â€œ[I] appreciate being able to access client information from home and the total migration process took less than two days.â€ The Practice Fusion EMR is free, we-based and low risk. Practitioners can start using Practice Fusion within minutes by visiting www.practicefusion.com.

About Practice Fusion
Practice Fusionâ€™s award-winning application addresses the complexities and critical needs of today's healthcare environments by providing a delivery model for physicians and patients at no cost. Practice Fusion's free, on-demand, low-risk EMR platform eliminates the complexities associated with licensing, implementation, integration and support experienced with traditional enterprise software solutions. Practice Fusion dramatically reduces the cost to the practice while enabling providers to deliver the highest level of care possible to their patients. For additional information:

milestones.description: Practice Fusion Grows over 1,300% since 2008, Surpassing 13,000 Users
milestones.source_text:
*Practice Fusion Grows over 1,300% since 2008, Surpassing 13,000 Users*

/Free Electronic Medical Record Provider Becomes the Fastest Growing
Physician Practice Community in the US/

*SAN FRANCISCO, Calif. â€“ February 13, 2009 -* Practice Fusion Inc., the
leader in free, web-based Electronic Medical Record applications for
physicians, today announced that it has exceeded 13,000 customers as of
February 2009. Practice Fusion's rapid growth stems from delivering a
free, web-based and simple electronic medical record (EMR) service with
industry-leading features and functionality.

In terms of subscribers, Practice Fusion is the fastest growing
Electronic Medical Record provider in the country. Practice Fusionâ€™s
customer base has grown 1,300% since the beginning of 2008.

"Just one year after we introduced our vision of 'The Free Electronic
Medical Record,' our scale and scope today confirm the wide market
readiness and acceptance of our model," said Ryan Howard, CEO and
chairman of Practice Fusion. "As the new administration ponders a
multi-billion dollar plan to computerize the nation's health records,
Practice Fusion has proven itself as a viable no cost solution to solve
this problem, as well as the leader among electronic medical record
providers."

Three major factors support the expansion of the Practice Fusion
community: free licensing, hosting, support and training for its
products. Because Practice Fusion is web-based, the program requires no
special hardware, software, or IT knowledge, enabling physicians to log
on anytime, anywhere. No risk functionality provides simple, lowest
total cost of ownership and low investment over time.

"As a practicing physician I see the dire need for a simple, easy to
acquire and implement EMR system," said David J. Wyatt, M.D. of
WeightLossMD, Atlanta, GA. "Having used Nextgen in recent past, it is a
relief to be working with a more responsive and dynamic group."

Other practicing physicians cite Practice Fusionâ€™s easy, universal
accessibility and simple learning curve as the biggest draws to the free
program.

To sign-up or learn more about Practice Fusionâ€™s free EMR, please visit
www.practicefusion.com/emr.htm .

*About Practice Fusion*

Practice Fusionâ€™s award-winning application addresses the complexities
and critical needs of today's healthcare environments by providing a
delivery model for physicians and patients at no cost. Practice Fusion's
free, on-demand, low-risk EMR platform eliminates the complexities
associated with licensing, implementation, integration and support
experienced with traditional enterprise software solutions. Practice
Fusion dramatically reduces the cost to the practice while enabling
providers to deliver the highest level of care possible to their
patients. For additional information, please visit
www.practicefusion.com .

www.practicefusion.com/product.htm


www.practicefusion.com/practitioners.htm
